nodes.text: Tsoss Beacon was an asteroid in the Tsoss Beacon system of the Deep Core, containing an Imperial communications relay station built in 3 BBY.

In 12 ABY, Admiral Natasi Daala called an assembly of thirteen Imperial warlords, including Sander Delvardus, Blitzer Harrsk, Treuten Teradoc, and Malfkla Yzu to negotiate and discuss the future of the Galactic Empire. Daala finally executed the warlords after hours of fruitless squabbling.
